message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is indeed worth $1500000 to you. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I propose an offer of $1400000 for the product. This price allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin while still providing you with significant savings compared to the market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss this further. Kind regards, Alice
